name: Link Crossbow training demake - Love Stung
name_original: Link Crossbow training demake - Love Stung
description:
Link Crossbow training demake - Love Stung

Original game by Eiksoft - Mod and reupload with permission to create a demake ASCII shooter on my favorite wii game

5 Lives, collect the flowers for your Queen Zelda - Defend yourself against the bee's
Controls
-
WASD  / Arrows Keys - Movement
Space / Mouse Button 2 - Jump
Mouse Button 1 - Fire
